div.head: 熱油灼傷
div.div: ; harm following sorching by hot oil

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: ; harm following sorching by hot oil

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with tang huo shang 湯火傷 , harm caused by boiling water and fire. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bai 柏 quotes Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 : 熱油灼傷 , 柏白皮，以臘豬脂煎油，塗瘡 上 , “ Harm following scorching by hot oil : boil the white bark of bai with cured lard to an oil and apply externally to the sores”.
